content.description: Based on the information in the table, which of the following substances produces the most energy per gram of substance combusted?
content.question: SubstanceMolar Mass <math alttext="(in grams per mole)" overflow="scroll"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>/</mo><mi>mol</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math>Heat Released from Combustion of One Mole of Substance <math alttext="(in kilojoules)" overflow="scroll"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mpadded><mi>kJ</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mpadded></math><math alttext="H 2, liquid" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>l</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math><math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math><math alttext="290" overflow="scroll"><mn>290</mn></math><math alttext="C H 4, liquid" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>CH</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>l</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math><math alttext="16" overflow="scroll"><mn>16</mn></math><math alttext="900" overflow="scroll"><mn>900</mn></math><math alttext="C 2 H 5 O H, liquid" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>5</mn></msub><mi>OH</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>l</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math><math alttext="46" overflow="scroll"><mn>46</mn></math><math alttext="1400" overflow="scroll"><mn>1400</mn></math><math alttext="C 18 H 38, liquid" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mn>18</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>38</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>l</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math><math alttext="254" overflow="scroll"><mn>254</mn></math><math alttext="12,000" overflow="scroll"><mn>12,000</mn></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="C 2 H 5 O H, liquid" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>5</mn></msub><mi>OH</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>l</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math>

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
